speech: Hi there! I'm here to listen. You can share how you're feeling today. For example, you might say, 'I’ve been feeling anxious lately.' What’s on your mind?
Hello! It’s great to see you. How can I help you today? If you want to talk about your feelings, I'm all ears!
Good day! I’m here for you. What’s been going on? If you’d like to share how you’re feeling, I’m ready to listen!
Hello there! I’m your mental health supporter. Please share what you’re going through. I’m here to listen and help
